description.raw:
When we import an hg repository to GitHub, all it imports all closed branches too are. This PR has a script that is intended to be executed when the current directory is a git repository. The script takes the URL of an hg repository as its argument, clones it to a temporary folder, and identifies the names of closed branches in that repository. It then checks if the git repository in the current folder has any remote branches that match the closed hg branch names, and uses `git push --delete` to delete them from the remote. I tested it on a fork:

* hg repo: * imported from https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics-release/
* imported to github: https://github.com/ignition-release/ign-physics2-release/branches
* my fork: https://github.com/scpeters/ign-physics2-release/branches

~~~
$ $RELEASE_TOOLS_PATH/jenkins-scripts/tools/git_delete_closed_hg_branches.bash \
 https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics-release
=========== Start Cloning HG Repository
requesting all changes
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 66 changesets with 154 changes to 59 files
new changesets 300f19c244d0:afc900c6a935 (3 drafts)
updating to branch default
53 files updated, 0 files merged, 0 files removed, 0 files unresolved
=========== Done Cloning HG Repository

=========== Identify Closed HG Branches
remote git branch found: build_dep_common3_profiler
To github.com:scpeters/ign-physics2-release.git
 - [deleted]         build_dep_common3_profiler
remote git branch found: control_dart6_utils-urdf
To github.com:scpeters/ign-physics2-release.git
 - [deleted]         control_dart6_utils-urdf
remote git branch found: dart69_2
To github.com:scpeters/ign-physics2-release.git
 - [deleted]         dart69_2
remote git branch found: dart_69
To github.com:scpeters/ign-physics2-release.git
 - [deleted]         dart_69
remote git branch found: explicit_dart7.4
To github.com:scpeters/ign-physics2-release.git
 - [deleted]         explicit_dart7.4
remote git branch found: multipackage
To github.com:scpeters/ign-physics2-release.git
 - [deleted]         multipackage
remote git branch found: release_1.0.0_pre2
To github.com:scpeters/ign-physics2-release.git
 - [deleted]         release_1.0.0_pre2
remote git branch found: use_collision_ode
To github.com:scpeters/ign-physics2-release.git
 - [deleted]         use_collision_ode
~~~

That deleted the closed branches. Running the script again:

~~~
$ $RELEASE_TOOLS_PATH/jenkins-scripts/tools/git_delete_closed_hg_branches.bash \
 https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics-release
=========== Start Cloning HG Repository
requesting all changes
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 66 changesets with 154 changes to 59 files
new changesets 300f19c244d0:afc900c6a935 (3 drafts)
updating to branch default
53 files updated, 0 files merged, 0 files removed, 0 files unresolved
=========== Done Cloning HG Repository

=========== Identify Closed HG Branches
remote git branch not found: build_dep_common3_profiler
remote git branch not found: control_dart6_utils-urdf
remote git branch not found: dart69_2
remote git branch not found: dart_69
remote git branch not found: explicit_dart7.4
remote git branch not found: multipackage
remote git branch not found: release_1.0.0_pre2
remote git branch not found: use_collision_ode
~~~

title.raw: git_delete_closed_hg_branches.bash: tool for deleted closed hg branches from git repo
